name: Mystical Valley
description:
Mystical Valley

Made for 2022 Winter Game Jam

A rhythm game that guides you throughout a procedurally generated path of nature.

Guide the Forest Mochi through a perilous path while bringing trees to life all around you. You can see a preview of the gameplay here:

Controls:

[W, A, S, D]

Controls may change depending on the stage progress.

Contributions in Detail:

- David Hermanto - Project Lead, Gameplay Programmer, UI and Particles, Soundtrack and Sound Effect Programmer.

- Ailyn Lam - Character Design, Generation Algorithm Optimization, Input System, Data System, Sound Effects.

- Darren Christoper - Contribution in Particle System and Input system.
